description: Configuration options for Astra Vectorize server-side embeddings.

model_name.info:
The embedding model to use for the selected provider. Each provider has a different set of models available (full list at https://docs.datastax.com/en/astra-db-serverless/databases/embedding-generation.html):

{models_list}

api_key_name.info: The name of the embeddings provider API key stored on Astra. If set, it will override the 'ProviderKey' in the authentication parameters.

provider_api_key.info: An alternative to the Astra Authentication that passes an API key for the provider with each request to Astra DB. This may be used when Vectorize is configured for the collection, but no corresponding provider secret is stored within Astra's key management system.

errors.build_failed: Failed to build Astra Vectorize configuration: {error}

logs.building_config: Building Astra Vectorize config - Provider: {provider}, Model: {model}
